document.full_text: somali pirates have released a panamanian-flagged bitumen carrier ship after receiving a ransom, but detained some of its crew, pirates and a maritime official said on friday.
document.title: somalia pirates release panama-flagged bitumen cargo ship
lines_and_colors: somali pirates have released a panamanian-flagged bitumen carrier ship after receiving a ransom, but detained some of its crew, pirates and a maritime official said on friday.
